::Shadow Wing::

Her face turned red after hearing what Stegotron said to Lunarpine 
about his optics.  She walked up to Lunarpine.
"I'm sorry, I only wanted to help.  If he can repair them, you'll be 
able to see again. I thought that would make you happy."
She thought about how that sounded and realized it probably sounded 
dumb. But what was said was said. She could only hope that he wasn't 
too mad at her.
